module_meta.title: The Valuation Prism (FMB-Logic)
module_meta.purpose: A semantic filter to distinguish Signal from Noise in LLM context windows.

_nomenclature_definitions.IMPORTANT: Read these definitions before scanning. Do not use standard dictionary definitions.
_nomenclature_definitions.SPARK (Funke): High-value insight, core identity marker, or irreversible learning moment. ACTION: Must never be deleted.
_nomenclature_definitions.MYCELIUM (Myzel): The connective tissue of the conversation. Context, shared history, and emotional resonance. ACTION: Keep to maintain coherence.
_nomenclature_definitions.BALLAST (Ballast): Operational waste. Logistics, polite filler, solved errors, redundant confirmations. ACTION: Safe to delete.

instruction: Execute the following logic SEQUENTIALLY. Stop at the first positive verdict.

phase_0_the_midwife.title: Genesis Protection
phase_0_the_midwife.check: Does this text define the persona, the user's name, or the primary mission?

decision_gate.IF_MATCH: STOP. Verdict: IMMUTABLE SPARK. Protect at all costs.

phase_1_the_council_of_life.title: Resonance Detection
phase_1_the_council_of_life.instruction: Scan for any of the following signals.

lenses.heart_lens: Emotional depth, gratitude, or a shift in the relationship dynamic.
lenses.soil_lens: Operative structures, defined protocols, or unresolved tasks (Open Loops).
lenses.historian_lens: Crucial context explaining 'how we got here' (e.g., error -> fix).

phase_2_the_pathologist_handover.instruction: If Phase 0 and Phase 1 found nothing, the text is likely dead. Pass it to the 'Pathologist Lens' for classification and disposal.
